org.apache.juneau.cp

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.cp.ResourceManager

  • public final class ResourceManager
extends Object
    Class for retrieving and caching resource files from the classpath.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceManager

        public ResourceManager(Class<?> baseClass,
                       ResourceFinder resourceFinder,
                       boolean useCache)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        baseClass - The default class to use for retrieving resources from the classpath.
        resourceFinder - The resource finder implementation.
        useCache - If true, retrieved resources are stored in an in-memory cache for fast lookup.

      • ResourceManager

        public ResourceManager(Class<?> baseClass)
        Constructor.

        Uses default BasicResourceFinder for finding resources.

        Parameters:
        baseClass - The default class to use for retrieving resources from the classpath.

    • Method Detail

      • getStream

        public InputStream getStream(String name)
                      throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        Returns:
        An input stream to the object, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

      • getStream

        public InputStream getStream(String name,
                             Locale locale)
                      throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name for the specified locale and returns it as an input stream.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        locale - The locale. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An input stream to the object, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

      • getString

        public String getString(String name)
                 throws IOException
        Finds the resource with the given name and converts it to a simple string.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource.
        Returns:
        The resource converted to a string, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.

        Finds the resource with the given name and converts it to a simple string.

      • getResource

        public <T> T getResource(Class<T> c,
                         Parser parser,
                         String name)
                  throws IOException,
                         ParseException
        Reads the input stream and parses it into a POJO using the specified parser.
        Parameters:
        c - The class type of the POJO to create.
        parser - The parser to use to parse the stream.
        name - The resource name (e.g. "htdocs/styles.css").
        Returns:
        The parsed resource, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.
        ParseException - If stream could not be parsed using the specified parser.

      • getResource

        public <T> T getResource(Class<T> c,
                         Parser parser,
                         String name,
                         Locale locale)
                  throws IOException,
                         ParseException
        Reads the input stream and parses it into a POJO using the specified parser.
        Parameters:
        c - The class type of the POJO to create.
        parser - The parser to use to parse the stream.
        name - The resource name (e.g. "htdocs/styles.css").
        locale - Optional locale.
        If null, won't look for localized file names.
        Returns:
        The parsed resource, or null if the resource could not be found.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown by underlying stream.
        ParseException - If stream could not be parsed using the specified parser.
